T02TD1540E:172b-33: dbus kyi rtsa'i steng gi sgo'i rtse mo nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:172b-34: gser gyi sgo nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:172b-35: zil pa'i thugs pa dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes kyi gnas yin zhes brda'i myong ngo //
T02TD1540E:172b-36: dz'a landha ra zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:172b-37: de nyid kyi ming gi rnam grangs yin te /
T02TD1540E:173a-1: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi dra ba'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so //
T02TD1540E:173a-2: sgo de nas khugs te ci byas she na /
T02TD1540E:173a-3: snga ma bzhin du dam tshig gi 'khor lo bsreg ste zhes bya ba smos pa la /
T02TD1540E:173a-4: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173a-5: sngar bstan pa'i rang gi lus la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD1540E:173a-6: lha mo'i 'khor lo bsregs pa bzhin du /
T02TD1540E:173a-7: kun du brtags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gnas pa yang //
T02TD1540E:173a-8: dam tshig gi 'khor lo sreg par byed pa ni /
T02TD1540E:173a-9: phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par zhen pa bsregs te /
T02TD1540E:173a-10: snang ba mchod pa'i ye shes thob nas /
T02TD1540E:173a-11: de'i rjes su rim gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid can snang ba thob pa'i ye shes tsam la /
T02TD1540E:173a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kar ngal bso bar bya'o //
T02TD1540E:173a-15: 'gro ba dang 'jug par byed cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1540E:173a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kar ngal bso ba'i dus su /
T02TD1540E:173a-17: dang por cung zad g-yo zhing nges par 'byung ste /
T02TD1540E:173a-18: mgrin pa dang spyi bo'i bar du phyin nas /
T02TD1540E:173a-20: stong pa nyid kyi dbyings su 'jug cing mi mthong zhing mi snang ste /
T02TD1540E:173a-23: skra'i rtse mo brgya stong du gshags pa'i tshad kyi phyir ro zhes gtan tshigs so //
T02TD1540E:173a-24: 'dis ni gzugs can gyi rdzas kyi ngo bo med par bshad do zhes rgyud kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173a-25: gong du bshad pa'i rigs pas so //
T02TD1540E:173a-26: rgyud kyi sgron ma'i brda'i sgras /
T02TD1540E:173a-27: sems la dmigs pa thob pa'i rim pa bstan to zhes las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa'i sgron ma bzhi'i t'i k'a las /
T02TD1540E:173a-28: rgyud kyi sgron ma ste gnyis pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1540E:173a-30: // / da ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyi sku sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid can bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa las gsungs pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid can /
T02TD1540E:173a-31: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las gang gsungs pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:173a-32: de'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1540E:173a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173a-34: stong pa nyid du yongs su thim pa'o //
T02TD1540E:173a-35: dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-0: snying rje'i @173b mtshan nyid can no //
T02TD1540E:173b-1: dmigs te zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis mngon du bya'o //
T02TD1540E:173b-2: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bdud rtsi blangs te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-3: de la chos kyi dbyings kyi phung po dang /
T02TD1540E:173b-4: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa de rnams kyi dbyings ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-5: mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu'i ye shes so //
T02TD1540E:173b-6: de nyid bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-7: sems can gyi don du 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du gnas shing /
T02TD1540E:173b-8: skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba 'phrog par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ngo //
T02TD1540E:173b-9: blangs te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-10: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi de shes rab kyis blangs la /
T02TD1540E:173b-11: de'i bdag nyid du gyur nas /
T02TD1540E:173b-12: sngar bshad pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyi gnas las /
T02TD1540E:173b-14: mngon par 'byung ba ni phyir 'byung la /
T02TD1540E:173b-15: 'o ma'i rgyun ltar zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-16: sngar bshad pa'i shes rab me'i gzugs can de nyid /
T02TD1540E:173b-17: 'o ma'i rgyun lta bur brtags pa ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-18: byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsi'i tshul du 'ong zhing /
T02TD1540E:173b-19: sgo de nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-20: sngon du bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jug pas so //
T02TD1540E:173b-22: rang gi spyi bor zhugs te /
T02TD1540E:173b-23: so'i zam pa'i nang du chud pa'i bug pa nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-24: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i rtsa dbu ma'i sgo nas /
T02TD1540E:173b-25: longs spyod kyi 'khor lor zhugs shing yul la longs spyod pa'i bde ba bskyed nas /
T02TD1540E:173b-26: cung zad 'gro bar ngal bsos te /
T02TD1540E:173b-27: sngar bsregs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-28: de nyid du song zhing mi snang bar gyur pa rnams la'o //
T02TD1540E:173b-29: dga' ba skyed cing zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:173b-30: dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsis mngon par gsal bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:173b-31: de lta bu'i byin gyis rlob pa'i mtshan nyid can /
T02TD1540E:173b-32: dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs pa'i sku bskyed par byas nas /
T02TD1540E:173b-33: kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems kyi tshul du /
T02TD1540E:173b-34: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas pa yin zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:173b-37: rdo rje nor bu'i chang gzungs kyi dbus su gnas par 'gyur zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:173b-38: de lta bu'i rnal 'byor ba la yang dang yang du goms par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:173b-39: de las kyang nges 'byung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1540E:174a-0: sngon du bshad pa bzhin du thams cad shes bya @174a * //
T02TD1540E:174a-1: ye shes kyi sgron ma ste /
T02TD1540E:174a-2: dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can /
T02TD1540E:174a-3: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa gsum pa bstan to zhes las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa'i sgron ma bzhi'i t'i k'a las ye shes kyi sgron ma ste gsum pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1540E:174a-5: // / da ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang dag pa'i mthas sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:174a-6: gsang ba'i sgron ma'i brdas mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:174a-7: slob dpon gyis 'di ltar gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1540E:174a-8: da ni sngags dang rgyud dang ye shes spangs pa zhes bya ba smos pa la /
T02TD1540E:174a-9: ngag dang sems dang lus rnam par dben pa don dam pa'i bden pa /
T02TD1540E:174a-11: thabs las byung ba'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1540E:174a-12: ji ltar mtshon par bya zhes sgo 'gags pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1540E:174a-13: shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su /
T02TD1540E:174a-14: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag las /
T02TD1540E:174a-15: phyi dang gsang ba'i sgo 'gags pa'i dus su /
T02TD1540E:174a-16: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba las nges par grol zhing zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:174a-17: rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gis bskyod du med pa'i bde ba chen po'i de kho na nyid nye bar mtshan par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:174a-18: phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang glal ba yul las nges par log pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:174a-19: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas skabs su /
T02TD1540E:174a-20: phung po la sogs pa der mi dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:174a-21: de lta bu'i de kho na nyid dpe gang gis shes par bya zhe na /
T02TD1540E:174a-22: mun nag 'thibs pa la zla ba'i nor bu ltar 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1540E:174a-23: mun nag thibs po ni gnam stong gi dus so //
T02TD1540E:174a-24: skal ba'i zla ba ni zla ba'o //
T02TD1540E:174a-25: de'i mtha' ni tsandra k'anta ste /
T02TD1540E:174a-27: de nyid nor bu dang 'dra bas na nor bu ste /
T02TD1540E:174a-28: rang gis 'od gsal ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:174a-29: de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de kho na nyid bzhi pa don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni zla ba'i nor bus rtogs par bya zhes man ngag go //
T02TD1540E:174a-31: rdul dang bral ba stong ba nyid //
T02TD1540E:174a-33: 'dod chags kyi tshul la gnas pas kyang 'dod chags kyi rdul gyis ma gos pa'o //
T02TD1540E:174a-34: stong pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1540E:174b-0: stong pa nyid gsum gyis rnam par @174b dag pas /
T02TD1540E:174b-1: thams cad stong pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:174b-2: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:174b-3: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i sgom ba spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:174b-4: yang na de la mtshan ma gzhan med pa yin te /
T02TD1540E:174b-6: de yang gzhan gyi mtshan ma ma yin te /
T02TD1540E:174b-8: ; smon pa med pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:174b-9: smon lam med pas kyang sgrub pa'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:174b-10: ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:174b-11: mi shes pa las log pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:174b-12: rang dang gzhan gyis rtogs pa spangs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:174b-13: gnyis su med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:174b-14: mchog tu zhi ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:174b-15: pa zhes bya bas don dam pa'i bden pa ston to //
T02TD1540E:174b-16: de bzhin du ram gyis kyang dam pa de nyid la me dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid bstan te /
T02TD1540E:174b-17: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi bud shing sreg par byed pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:174b-18: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni sh'antim ste /
T02TD1540E:174b-19: yi ge shes pa'i bde ba shes par bya'o //
T02TD1540E:174b-20: aanta'i sgras kyang dpe las byung ba'i don gyis bde ba lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid can /
T02TD1540E:174b-21: de kho na nyid lnga pa bstan to //
T02TD1540E:174b-23: de nyid lnga pa rdzogs pa yin //
T02TD1540E:174b-24: rim gyis lhan cig skyes mi zad //
T02TD1540E:174b-26: chags pa dang chags bral 'dres par gyur pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:174b-27: dga' ba la sogs pa'i sems kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ro gcig gi ngo bo nyid /
T02TD1540E:174b-28: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:174b-30: dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1540E:174b-31: de la thog ma tha ma bar med cing //
T02TD1540E:174b-32: de ni srid pa ma yin mya ngan las 'das min //
T02TD1540E:174b-33: gang zhig bde ba chen po de ni gzhan min bdag tu gyur pa'ang min //
T02TD1540E:174b-35: mar la mar blugs pa lta bur 'gyur ba zhes pa ni /
T02TD1540E:174b-36: ye shes dang shes bya dbyer med pa'i phyir //
T02TD1540E:174b-37: yang na bsgom par bya ba dang sgom pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:174b-39: bde ba dam ba de la ni //
T02TD1540E:174b-40: bsgom bya sgom pa po yang med //
T02TD1540E:174b-41: lus med bzung ba dang ni de bzhin nyid kyang med //
T02TD1540E:174b-42: sha med khrag med bshad pa med cing gci ba'ang med gyur pa //
T02TD1540E:174b-43: rlabs med lhan cig skyes pa de ni sna tshogs ngo mtshar yin //
T02TD1540E:174b-44: zhes dgyes pa'i rdo rje las gsungs so //
T02TD1540E:175a-2: rnam par rtog pa bag chags bcas par 'gags pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:175a-3: bdag med pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:175a-4: sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i sku la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:175a-5: de ltar mtshan gzhir gyur pa'i thabs las 'byung ba so sor bstan nas /
T02TD1540E:175a-6: de'i mtshon par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid thabs bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:175a-7: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1540E:175a-8: byang chub kyi sems ni kun rdzob kyi thig le'o //
T02TD1540E:175a-9: de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po'i gzhir gyur pa /
T02TD1540E:175a-10: shes rab kyi sbyar bas bskyed cing gsungs la /
T02TD1540E:175a-11: mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi'i sbyor bas ngo bo nyid kyi sku bzhi pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1540E:175a-12: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang goms par bya zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:175a-13: de gang du goms she na /
T02TD1540E:175a-14: 'dod chags can gyi ngo bo'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:175a-15: mtshon par byed pa'i gnas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:175a-16: btsun mo'i bha ga bde ba can //
T02TD1540E:175a-17: zhes bya bar bzhugs so zhes bya ba smos pa la /
T02TD1540E:175a-19: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD1540E:175a-21: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1540E:175a-23: de rnams kyi bha ga ni rtags te /
T02TD1540E:175a-24: de kho na nyid nye bar dmigs pa'i gnas mchog go //
T02TD1540E:175a-26: gnas ni shes rab bha gar bshad //
T02TD1540E:175a-27: khams rnams kun gyi mchog gyur pa'o //
T02TD1540E:175a-29: de bas na bha ga de bde ba can zhes bya ba smos pa las /
T02TD1540E:175a-30: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba gang la yod pa de ni bde ba can de la bzhugs zhes tshig sbyar ro //
T02TD1540E:175a-31: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1540E:175a-32: bzhugs gnas su zhes bya ba smos pa ni /
T02TD1540E:175a-33: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po'i spyod lam gyi gnas /
T02TD1540E:175a-34: bha ga yin pas der bzhugs zhes 'brel pa'o //
T02TD1540E:175a-35: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs gnas yin pas de'i phyir de nyid du 'tshol bar bya ba zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:175a-37: ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la mtshon pa'i gnas bstan nas /
T02TD1540E:175a-38: nga ni phyag rgya chen po pa'i rnal 'byor pa la /
T02TD1540E:175a-39: gleng gzhi'i tshig las gsungs pa'i /
T02TD1540E:175a-40: btsun mo'i bha ga'i khyad par gyi sgo nas /
T02TD1540E:175b-0: mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi'i gsan rab rib tu bstan par bya ba'i @175b phyir /
T02TD1540E:175b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:175b-2: phung po la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba smos pa la /
T02TD1540E:175b-3: phung po dang khams la sogs pa de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas //
T02TD1540E:175b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bshad /
T02TD1540E:175b-6: dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs zhes pa //
T02TD1540E:175b-7: de bzhin du yang 'ongs pa ste //
T02TD1540E:175b-8: des tshig sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02TD1540E:175b-9: de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod pa yin //
T02TD1540E:175b-11: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:175b-12: phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni /
T02TD1540E:175b-16: de'i brda'i bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1540E:175b-18: yi ge rnams zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1540E:175b-19: zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po'i bar ma chad pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:175b-20: de rnams kyi rdo rjes ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:175b-21: spyi bor gnas pa'i ye shes kyi thig le bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:175b-23: sku gsum yongs su shes pa ni //
T02TD1540E:175b-24: bde chen 'khor lo yang dag bshad //
T02TD1540E:175b-26: byang chub kyi sems te zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:175b-27: de nyid don dam pa'i cha la brten te /
T02TD1540E:175b-29: shu kra zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:175b-30: de nyid kyi kun rdzob kyi cha la brten te /
T02TD1540E:175b-31: ming gi rnam grangs bstan te /
T02TD1540E:175b-32: de med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:175b-33: de'i btsun mo zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:175b-34: de bzhin gshegs pas brdas gsungs pa'i rol byed ma'i sgras chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid bde ba chen po ste /
T02TD1540E:175b-35: btsun mo nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1540E:175b-36: mi la sogs pa'i mo'i gzugs so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:175b-39: ye shes kyi phyag rgya la mngon par zhen pa can /
T02TD1540E:175b-41: bar pa rnams 'jug par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin gyi /
T02TD1540E:175b-42: dbang po rno ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor ba rnams la ma yin zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:175b-43: de'i bha ga ni zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:175b-44: don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi /
T02TD1540E:175b-45: rol byed ma zhes bya ba'i gnas phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD1540E:175b-46: de'i bha ga zhes bya ba ni lus dang dag dang yid kyi rnam par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa gsum ma tshang ba'i gnas so //
T02TD1540E:176a-1: sbyor bsam pa'i bye brag gi phyag rgya du ma yin pas /
T02TD1540E:176a-2: bha ga rnams la bzhugs so zhes byed pa'i tshig mang po'i mtha' can du bstan to zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1540E:176a-3: don 'di las don gzhan med ces dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:176a-5: shu kra'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1540E:176a-6: de bde rol byed ma ru bshad //
T02TD1540E:176a-7: ces dgyes pa'i rdo rje las byung ngo //
T02TD1540E:176a-8: gang tshe rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bcom ldan 'das te /
T02TD1540E:176a-9: bha ga la bzhugs pa de'i tshe /
T02TD1540E:176a-10: bdag gis thos zhes sdud pa pos bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes gsungs te /
T02TD1540E:176a-12: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid 'di'i gsal ba /
T02TD1540E:176a-13: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur par mtshon to //
T02TD1540E:176a-14: don 'di nyid slob dpon nyid kyis kyang //
T02TD1540E:176a-15: rgyud kyi tshig la brten te /
T02TD1540E:176a-16: dran par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa //
T02TD1540E:176a-17: ae yi rnam pa lha yi gang //
T02TD1540E:176a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1540E:176a-19: phyag rgya chen po'i phyogs su sngon du bshad pa'i don kho na shes par bya'o //
T02TD1540E:176a-20: gzhan du na ni zur gsum gyi rnam pa kho na'o //
T02TD1540E:176a-23: 'od gsal ba ye shes mtshon par byed pa'o //
T02TD1540E:176a-24: yang na lha'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:176a-25: mi la sogs pa'i mo'i zur gsum legs par sbyangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:176a-26: dbus su wam gis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1540E:176a-28: phyogs dang po las ni thabs su gyur ba'i byang chub kyi yid kyis brgyan cing mdzes pa ste ldan pa'i don to //
T02TD1540E:176a-30: yi ge wam zhes bya ba ni rdo rje skyes bu'i rtags kyis brgyan cing //
T02TD1540E:176a-31: legs par mdzes shing zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:176a-32: gang nga zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:176a-34: gang gi phyir yi ge ae ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid yin pa de'i phyir na 'di gsum ste //
T02TD1540E:176a-35: bde ba kun gyi gnas yin te //
T02TD1540E:176a-36: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:176a-37: bde ba kun ni dga' ba la sogs pa thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa bzhi bzhi'o //
T02TD1540E:176a-38: de rnams kyi gnas ni rtogs par byed pa'i brda'o //
T02TD1540E:176a-39: de la gsum gsum ni 'jig rten pa'i'o //
T02TD1540E:176a-40: re re ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02TD1540E:176b-0: de ltar na rang bzhin brtags pa @176b 'dis dgongs pa gang yod ce na /
T02TD1540E:176b-1: de la dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1540E:176b-3: blang bar bya ba'i sgom pa'i dngos po yongs su shes pas //
T02TD1540E:176b-4: byang chub thob par 'gyur zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:176b-5: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:176b-6: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed sangs rgyas rin po che rnams kyi /
T02TD1540E:176b-7: za ma tog ces bya ba ni snod yin te /
T02TD1540E:176b-8: 'byung gnas dang thim pa'i sa zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:176b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:176b-11: yang na 'od gsal ba'i don dam pa las //
T02TD1540E:176b-12: sngon cad kyi smon lam gyi dbang gis /
T02TD1540E:176b-13: sems can rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:176b-14: sangs rgyas rin po che rnams /
T02TD1540E:176b-15: rin po che'i za ma tog phye ba ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:176b-16: de ni gleng gzhi'i tshig las sdud pa pos ston pa phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa gang gsungs pa /
T02TD1540E:176b-17: de dag slob dpon nyid kyis bsten par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1540E:176b-18: de dag sprul pa'i lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02TD1540E:176b-19: de la thos zhes bya ba la tshig sbyar ro //
T02TD1540E:176b-21: bstan pa'i snying por gyur pa thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1540E:176b-22: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:176b-23: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa lag na rdo rje bdag gis so //
T02TD1540E:176b-24: de la sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba smos te //
T02TD1540E:176b-25: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chad chen po'i phyag rgya chen po yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:176b-26: de lta bu'i bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:176b-27: nyams su myong zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:176b-29: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku las zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1540E:176b-30: gang gi tshe ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa bdag cag rnams la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02TD1540E:176b-31: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD1540E:176b-32: zla ba rgyas pa dang 'dra ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi thig ler bzhugs shing /
T02TD1540E:176b-33: 'od gsal ba sprin med pa'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzhugs shing gnas pa de'i tshe //
T02TD1540E:176b-34: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de las thos shing zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:176b-37: gcig ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa //
T02TD1540E:177a-2: de nyid skyob pa'i chos skur 'dod //
T02TD1540E:177a-4: de ltar zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa'i don nye bar sdud par mdzad de //
T02TD1540E:177a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:177a-6: sdud pa pos khyad par can gyis nyams su myong pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skad cig ma gang gleng gzhi'i tshig las so sor bstan pa /
T02TD1540E:177a-7: de slob dpon gyis bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1540E:177a-9: de ni byang chub kyi sems gang bzhugs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:177a-10: byang chub kyi sems kyi tshul du rdo rje 'dzin pa gang bzhugs pa de las /
T02TD1540E:177a-11: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:177a-12: mngon par byang chub pa'i skad cig ma'i dus su /
T02TD1540E:177a-13: bdag gis thos zhes snga ma bzhin du tshig gi 'brel pa shes par bya'o //
T02TD1540E:177a-15: snang ba mtshan mo'i cha ste gsal ba nyi ma'i 'od zer 'gyed pa snang ba mched pa yin //
T02TD1540E:177a-16: mtshams ni snang ba thob pa rang gi rang bzhin rnams dang rtag tu ldan pa yin //
T02TD1540E:177a-17: mtshan mo ma yin mtsham [*mtshams?] min nyin min gang zhig rang bzhin rnams dang bral //
T02TD1540E:177a-18: de ni byang chub skad cig bla ma dam pas gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod yul yin //
T02TD1540E:177a-20: / skad cig ma de nyid rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rim pas /
T02TD1540E:177a-21: slob dpon nyid kyis ston par mdzad de /
T02TD1540E:177a-22: dus gcig ces bya ba ni //
T02TD1540E:177a-23: dpyid kyi dus gcig tu ste zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:177a-25: des na skal ba dang ldan pa'i khyad par can gyi dus //
T02TD1540E:177a-26: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i me tog 'byung du rung ba //
T02TD1540E:177a-27: rang 'byung me tog 'byung ba'i dus su mtshon par bya ba yin te /
T02TD1540E:177a-28: bde ba nyams pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:177a-29: de yang gang gis mtshon par bya ba yin zhe na /
T02TD1540E:177a-30: sna'i bug pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rlung 'gags pa'i tshe zhes bya ba'i don to zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1540E:177a-31: phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor pa'i dbang gis //
T02TD1540E:177a-32: srog dang rtsol ba 'gog pa las mtshon par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to zhes bya ba la //
T02TD1540E:177a-33: 'dis ni khyad par shes par bya ste /
T02TD1540E:177a-34: des ni g-yas dang g-yon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas //
T02TD1540E:177b-0: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid can 'dod chags dang @177b bral ba'i ngo bo nyid /
T02TD1540E:177b-1: dus bzangs dang dus ngan dag bshad do //
T02TD1540E:177b-2: 'gog pa zhes bya ba 'dis kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus shes par bya'o //
T02TD1540E:177b-4: dus ni dam tshig brjod pa ste //
T02TD1540E:177b-5: dus de rnam pa gsum du 'dod //
T02TD1540E:177b-6: bzang dus dang ni ngan dus dang //
T02TD1540E:177b-7: bsam gyis mi khyab dus de bzhin /
T02TD1540E:177b-8: sna yi bug pa kha sbyar las //
T02TD1540E:177b-9: 'ong ba dus bzangs rab tu grags //
T02TD1540E:177b-10: song ba nyid ni dus ngan te //
T02TD1540E:177b-11: de yi bar gyi dus gcig grags //
T02TD1540E:177b-12: grogs med gcig pur gyur pa ste //
T02TD1540E:177b-13: dus de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02TD1540E:177b-14: srog dang rtsol ba rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1540E:177b-15: de bzhin 'byung rdu ba dag las 'das //
T02TD1540E:177b-17: de ni dus gcig ces brjod do //
T02TD1540E:177b-19: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
T02TD1540E:177b-20: dbu mar yang ni dmigs mi 'gyur //
T02TD1540E:177b-21: chags dang chags bral dag gis ni //
T02TD1540E:177b-22: 'dres par gyur pa mi shigs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:177b-23: mar la mar ni 'dres pa bzhin //
T02TD1540E:177b-24: gcig tu gyur pa rnyog pa med //
T02TD1540E:177b-25: de bzhin chags dang chags bral gyis //
T02TD1540E:177b-26: ro gcig skad cig gcig tu gsung //
T02TD1540E:177b-28: dpyid kyi dus ni de bzhin te //
T02TD1540E:177b-29: dus gsum mnyam par sbyor ba las //
T02TD1540E:177b-30: de ni dus gcig ces brjod do //
T02TD1540E:177b-31: zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag / de bzhin shar ba nub pa dang //
T02TD1540E:177b-32: snying stobs rdul dang mun pa dag / gang tshe log par gyur pa las //
T02TD1540E:177b-33: byang chub sems ni brtan gyur na //
T02TD1540E:177b-34: de nyid ro gcig skad cig yin //
T02TD1540E:177b-35: de 'dra'i dus gcig de la ni //
T02TD1540E:177b-36: bcom ldan de ni yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1540E:177b-37: zhes bshad pa'i rgyud las 'byung ngo ;
T02TD1540E:177b-38: / kye lha dang mi rnams dus de la rdo rje 'dzin pas //
T02TD1540E:177b-39: bdag gis thos pa'i de kho na nyid nyon cig / gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas /
T02TD1540E:177b-40: khyed cag rnams la bdag kho na ston pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin no //
T02TD1540E:177b-41: khyed cag rnams kyang skal pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu rnams la /
T02TD1540E:177b-42: phyis ston par 'gyur zhes lung gi man ngag gcig nas gcig tu ma nyams pa'i de kho na nyid 'grub ces sdud pa po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi /
T02TD1540E:177b-43: bdag gis thos zhes tshig gi dgos pa mkhas pas shes par bya'o //
T02TD1540E:178a-0: de ni sngon du bshad pa'i srog dang rtsol ba nyid kho na @178a * //
T02TD1540E:178a-1: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu yin zhes dran par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:178a-4: chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung //
T02TD1540E:178a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa las //
T02TD1540E:178a-6: chos rnams zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:178a-7: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1540E:178a-8: rang bzhin dang snang ba'i ngo bo nyid sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
T02TD1540E:178a-9: rgyu las byung zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1540E:178a-11: de rgyu zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1540E:178a-15: rlung ni phra ba'i gzugs dang ni //
T02TD1540E:178a-16: zhes dang yang ni 'dres gyur nas //
T02TD1540E:178a-18: yul rnams la ni dmigs par byed //
T02TD1540E:178a-19: gang tshe snang bar ldan gyur na //
T02TD1540E:178a-20: rlung gin bzhin pa nyid gyur nas //
T02TD1540E:178a-21: de tshe rang bzhin de dag kun //
T02TD1540E:178a-22: lus med pa rnams ga la 'jig / ces gsungs so //
T02TD1540E:178a-23: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs zhes bya ba ni ;
T02TD1540E:178a-24: thams cad mkhyen pas bstan to //
T02TD1540E:178a-25: de rnams kyi 'gog pa gang yin pa de yang gsungs zhes tshig lhag ma sbyar ro //
T02TD1540E:178a-26: chos de rnams kyi 'gog pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste //
T02TD1540E:178a-30: stong pa nyid gsum rnam par dag pas thar pa'i don du so sor bstan ces bya ba'i don to /
T02TD1540E:178a-32: stong pa gsum gyi rnam dag gang //
T02TD1540E:178a-33: 'od gsal bar ni de bshad do //
T02TD1540E:178a-34: yi shes gsum po rnam dag pa //
T02TD1540E:178a-35: thams cad stong pa'i gnas su bshad //
T02TD1540E:178a-36: ye shes dag nas de nyid dang //
T02TD1540E:178a-37: thams cad mkhyen pa bla na med //
T02TD1540E:178a-38: snang ba med cing 'gyur ba med //
T02TD1540E:178a-39: gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste //
T02TD1540E:178a-40: de ni yod min med min zhing //
T02TD1540E:178a-41: dag gi spyod yul las 'das pa //
T02TD1540E:178a-42: de bas 'od gsal dag pa las //
T02TD1540E:178a-44: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing //
T02TD1540E:178a-45: dpe byad brgyad cu yang dag ldan //
T02TD1540E:178a-46: rnam pa thams cad kun ldan pa //
T02TD1540E:178a-47: thams cad mkhyen pa de las 'gyur //
T02TD1540E:178a-49: dge sbyong chen pos 'di skad gsungs //
T02TD1540E:178a-52: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
T02TD1540E:178b-0: de smra bar @178b byed pas na /
T02TD1540E:178b-3: dge sbyong chen po zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1540E:178b-4: sdud pa po 'phags pa dge sbyong kun dga' bo'o //
T02TD1540E:178b-5: tshig de nyid kyang gang gis smras she na /
T02TD1540E:178b-7: rdo rje'i theg pa las kyang phyag na rdo rjes so //
T02TD1540E:178b-8: de ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i blo can rnams la srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag / dbyer med pa nyid du so sor bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1540E:178b-9: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa //
T02TD1540E:178b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1540E:178b-11: de la srid pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD1540E:178b-15: de dag ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin te /
T02TD1540E:178b-16: don dam pas khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:178b-17: de la 'chi ba'i srid pa ni 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
T02TD1540E:178b-19: phung po la sogs pa mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:178b-20: srid pa bar ma do ni 'ja' tshon dang mtshungs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin te /
T02TD1540E:178b-21: 'od gsal ba las dang por skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:178b-22: skye ba'i srid pa ni sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid yin te /
T02TD1540E:178b-23: 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:178b-25: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
T02TD1540E:178b-27: de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
T02TD1540E:178b-28: rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas //
T02TD1540E:178b-30: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1540E:178b-31: chos thams cad kyi rang gzugs so //
T02TD1540E:178b-32: des srid pa srid bral bya zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1540E:178b-33: srid pa'i ming tsam yang med par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1540E:178b-34: ngo bo nyid kyis zhes der chos can du ma yin pas //
T02TD1540E:178b-35: chos nyid kyang mang po'i tshig gi mtha' can du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1540E:178b-36: ji ltar na 'khor ba nyid mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med pa bzhin du //
T02TD1540E:178b-37: dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang gsungs te /
T02TD1540E:178b-38: rnam dag yid ldan rnams la ni //
T02TD1540E:178b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1540E:178b-41: rim pa lnga pa las kyang //
T02TD1540E:178b-42: sems gang gis ni byas pa rnams //
T02TD1540E:178b-43: 'khor bar bcings par gyur ba ste //
T02TD1540E:178b-44: sems de nyid kyis rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD1540E:178b-45: bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas su 'gro //
T02TD1540E:178b-47: gzhan yang snang ba'i phreng ba las kyang //
T02TD1540E:178b-48: srid gsum mthar byed kyis ni srid pa gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1540E:178b-49: mdor bsdus pa ni sems kyi rtog pa tsam //
T02TD1540E:179a-1: de ni gal te rnams spangs na //
T02TD1540E:179a-2: skye ba'i nying mtshams sbyor pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur //
T02TD1540E:179a-3: zhes slob dpon zla ba pa'i zhabs kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1540E:179a-4: de ltar na rang rig pa'i 'od gsal ba rang bzhin gyis yongs su rnam par dag pa //
T02TD1540E:179a-5: 'gro ba 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du shes nas //
T02TD1540E:179a-6: rnal 'byor pas thar pa'i yul du ring ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1540E:179a-7: da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid la ring ba'i 'du shes spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1540E:179a-8: da ltar byung ba ni de ltar gnas pa ste /
T02TD1540E:179a-9: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD1540E:179a-10: de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de kho na nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD1540E:179a-11: yang na skad cig ma re re la 'byung zhing gnas pas na /
T02TD1540E:179a-12: da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo ste /
T02TD1540E:179a-13: dus thams cad du mi 'gyur zhing don dam pa'i bden pa ste chos kyi dbyings so //
T02TD1540E:179a-14: de la ni ring ba'i 'du shes spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1540E:179a-15: de kho na nyid rig pas bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur zhes ring ba'i 'du shes bya ba ma yin no //
T02TD1540E:179a-16: snang ba'i phreng ba las kyang //
T02TD1540E:179a-17: rnal 'byor rig pas thar ba la /
T02TD1540E:179a-18: ring pa'i 'du shes bya ba min //
T02TD1540E:179a-19: stong pa nyid kun brtags pa yi //
T02TD1540E:179a-20: tshul gyis mthong yang bdag nyid grol //
T02TD1540E:179a-21: zhes slob dpon la ba pas gsungs so zhes //
T02TD1540E:179a-22: gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba la //
T02TD1540E:179a-23: sdud pa pos mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa brgyud pa'i rim pa'i sgro nas /
T02TD1540E:179a-24: gsang ba ston par byed pa'i tshig phye ba ni sgron ma ste rdzogs so zhes tshig sbyar ro /
T02TD1540E:179a-26: // / de'i rjes su rab tu byed pa'i mkhan po slob dpon nyid kyis gsungs te /
T02TD1540E:179a-27: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1540E:179a-28: sgron ma lta bu bzhi bo 'di mdor bsdus te mtshon par byas zhes tshig sbyar ro //
T02TD1540E:179a-29: de la man ngag dran par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1540E:179a-30: slob dpon gyis mtshon par bya ba yin gyis //
T02TD1540E:179a-32: dgongs pa ni gang gi phyir gang shes rab rno ba de dag gis //
T02TD1540E:179a-33: bdag gi slob ma'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing shes par 'gyur te /
T02TD1540E:179a-34: gang yang blo dman zhing slob dpon gyi man ngag gi rgyud kyi rim pa dang bral ba /
T02TD1540E:179a-35: rab byung de rnams la gsang bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1540E:179b-0: slob dpon gyis rgyas par ma bshad cing 'grel ba ma @179b mdzad do //
T02TD1540E:179b-1: gang gis phyir 'grel pa tsam la brten te /
T02TD1540E:179b-2: dgongs pa med pa'i bshad pas /
T02TD1540E:179b-3: rang nyams pa de rnams kyis gzhan rnams la yang phyin ci log pa'i lam ston pas /
T02TD1540E:179b-4: nyams par byed ces dgongs na ste /
T02TD1540E:179b-5: slob dpon gyis sgron ma bzhi po 'di mdor bsdus te mtshon pa tsam mdzad do zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:179b-6: de lta na ci rang bzos bstan bcos 'di mdzad ce na /
T02TD1540E:179b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bar las zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1540E:179b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab kho na 'di yin gyis //
T02TD1540E:179b-9: bdag gi ni ma yin no //
T02TD1540E:179b-10: 'on te bdag gis btus zhes slob dpon nyid kyi lung gi rjes su 'brang ba nyid shes par bya'o //
T02TD1540E:179b-11: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las gang btus she na /
T02TD1540E:179b-12: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD1540E:179b-13: de la dgongs pa 'di yin te /
T02TD1540E:179b-14: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong las brjod par bya ba'i de kho na nyid gang gsungs pa /
T02TD1540E:179b-15: de nyid gzhung re re las sems can gyi dbyings gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1540E:179b-16: de'i rjes su 'brang zhing mdor bsdus pa'i man ngag sgron ma bzhi zhes bya ba bsdus /
T02TD1540E:179b-18: chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong las //
T02TD1540E:179b-19: thub pa chen pos gsungs pa dag / snying po las ni snying po mchog / mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1540E:179b-21: de la gal te gang zhig 'dir smra na ci'i phyir 'dus pa'i rim pas 'di bshad ce na /
T02TD1540E:179b-23: gang gi phyir rgyud kyis rgyud gzhan rtogs par bya zhes bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:179b-24: de lta yin na ci'i phyir //
T02TD1540E:179b-25: mngon par byang chub pa'i 'og tu /
T02TD1540E:179b-26: zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa ma bstan ce na /
T02TD1540E:179b-27: de la yang 'gal ba med de gang gi phyir bden pa gnyis la ma 'dus pa'i bsgrub bya gzhan med pas so //
T02TD1540E:179b-28: gal te yod na don ni 'di nyid las gzhan ma yin no //
T02TD1540E:179b-31: 'od gsal ba dag la zung du 'jug pa zhes ming tsam btags so //
T02TD1540E:179b-32: de bas na las dang po ba'i dus su kho na kun rdzob dang don dam pa la dbyer med pa'i tshul zhes nas 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas zung du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa yin pas 'dir ma bstan to //
T02TD1540E:180a-1: pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa yang ci'i phyir ma bstan ce na //
T02TD1540E:180a-2: de la 'dir smra ba yin te //
T02TD1540E:180a-3: rnal 'byor ma'i bla ma'i rgyud 'di la dbang bskur thob pa'i sgrub pa pos dus de nyis su gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa la des pa skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1540E:180a-4: des ni sgron ma bzhi pos yin gyi lnga ni ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1540E:180a-5: man dag tshig tsam rmongs pa yin //
T02TD1540E:180a-6: gang gis rtogs par mi 'gyur na //
T02TD1540E:180a-7: mtshams med las kyi 'jigs pas ni //
T02TD1540E:180a-8: de yis bskur bar bya ba min //
T02TD1540E:180a-9: bdag gis bla ma dam pa las //
T02TD1540E:180a-10: yang dag legs par 'di thos te //
T02TD1540E:180a-11: don 'di dran par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1540E:180a-12: ci nus par ni bshad par byas //
T02TD1540E:180a-13: 'di la nyes pa yod gyur na //
T02TD1540E:180a-14: dam pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs //
T02TD1540E:180a-15: rmongs pa gsal byed t'i k'a 'di //
T02TD1540E:180a-16: tshig don ma lus ston byed pa //
T02TD1540E:180a-17: brtsams te bsod nams gang bsags pa //
T02TD1540E:180a-18: de yis 'jig rten grol bar shog / slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1540E:180a-19: sgron ma bzhi zhes bya ba'i man ngag gi t'i k'a las /
T02TD1540E:180a-20: gsang ba'i sgron ma ste bzhi pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1540E:180a-22: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shr'i dha ra nyid kyi zhabs kyi zhal snga nas kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
